archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.10c: c) recorded in an information risk register (e.g. a spreadsheet, database or dedicated risk management tool), which should include details about each risk (e.g. related asset, impact, likelihood and risk rating)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
